text: Ardsley is a village in Westchester County, New York, United States. It is part of the town of Greenburgh. The village's population was 5,079 at the 2020 census. Summers in this region are hot and muggy, while winters are often temperate to chilly. The KÃ¶ppen Climate Classification system describes Ardsley's climate as humid subtropical, or "Cfa" on climate maps. About 28 inches of snow fall there annually. ==References== Category:Villages in New York (state)
title: Ardsley, New York
